author: Josh Gerstein
title: Legal battles escalate over virus dangers to immigration detainees
description: An immigrant detained in New Jersey is the first such confirmed COVID-19 case, ICE says
content:
U.S. District Court Judge James Boasberg in Washington set a Monday afternoon hearing on a request for a temporary restraining order that would spring 37 immigrant families held at detention centers in Texas and Pennsylvania.
